snippet: Augsburg have given interim coach Manuel Baum "a long-term contract" after he impressed in his first two games in charge....
lead_paragraph: Augsburg have given interim coach Manuel Baum "a long-term contract" after he impressed in his first two games in charge.

headline.main: Baum Given Augsburg Job on Long-Term Basis
headline.print_headline: Baum Given Augsburg Job on Long-Term Basis
